title: Ägglossning Kalkylator
description: Beräkna your ovulation date and fertile window
metaDescription: Gratis ovulation calculator - Predict your ovulation date, fertile window and most fertile days of the month. Ideal for family planning.

form.title: Ange your information
form.lastPeriodLabel: First day of your last period
form.lastPeriodHelp: Datum of the first day of your last menstruation
form.cycleLengthHelp: Average length of your cycle (typically 28 days)

info.title: Om the Ägglossning Kalkylator
info.description: This calculator predicts your ovulation date and fertile window baserat på your last period and cycle length. Ägglossning typically occurs 14 days before the next period. The fertile window includes the 5 days before ovulation and the day of ovulation.
info.formula: Formel: Ägglossning date = First day of last period + (Cycle length - 14 days)
info.limitations: Note: This calculator provides estimates baserat på averages. Cycles can vary from person to person and month to month. For greater accuracy, consider using ovulation monitoring methods such as basal temperature or ovulation prediction kits. Always consult with your doctor for family planning.
